information: L'HEXAGONALE, based at Pessac in Gironde, is a company that has specialized in wholesale food imports-exports since 2018. We sell a wide variety of products including olive oil and other vegetable oils, pasta, couscous, canned food, juices and soft drinks as well as energy drinks, tomato paste, harissa, dates, olives, and many other items. We are the official importer for the SIM brand in France, as well as other sector brand leaders. Our mission is to offer you high quality products and the most well-known brands to give you the best satisfaction. Additionally, we organise product transport by air or sea to guarantee delivery in the best conditions. Feel free to contact us for further details!
